item.title: Sex Pistols - Anarchy In The U.K
item.description:
I am a antichrist
I am a anarchist
Don’t know
what I want but
I know
how to get it
I wanna destroy
the passer by
Cos I I wanna be
ya anarchy-
No dogs body
anarchy for the U K
It’s coming some time
and may be ya
I give a wrong time
stop a trafic line
Your future dream
is a shopping scheme
Cos I I wanna be
anarchy- in the city-

How many ways
to get what you want
I use the best
I use the rest
I use the enemy
I use anarchy
Cos I I wanna be

to be-

or is this the U D A
Or is this the I R A

tenancy
I wanna be ya anarchy-
and I wanna be
